title: Guatemala: Citicards Presents Citi Multipremios Platinum with New Restaurant and Entertainment Benefits
summary: Guatemala - Citi Guatemala announced the re-launch of the Citi MultiPremios Platinum chip credit card as part of its commitment to innovation and value-added services adapted to its clients' lifestyle.
tag-1: Guatemala: Citicards Presents Citi Multipremios Platinum with New Restaurant and Entertainment Benefits
tag-3: Guatemala – Citi Guatemala announced the re-launch of the Citi MultiPremios Platinum chip credit card as part of its commitment to innovation and value-added services adapted to its clients' lifestyle.
tag-4: With the new Citi MultiPremios Platinum credit card, clients who enjoy going out to eat, to the theater, movies, bowling and amusement parks can accumulate two MultiPremios Miles for every dollar they spend on entertainment and restaurants, in addition to one mile for purchases at other commercial establishments and automatic payments. As a welcome gift, clients can earn up to 35,000 Multipremios Miles the first year.
tag-5: "At Citi, our goal is to offer simple solutions that benefit our clients' lifestyle. To this end, we are improving the value offered by all Citi credit cards affiliated with the MultiPremios loyalty program. The main benefit of the MultiPremios Platinum card is the ability to earn double miles for restaurant and entertainment purchases, which can be redeemed for gifts, prizes, travel and even credit toward outstanding balances," commented Luis Fernando Gómez, Citi Guatemala's Products and Segments Manager.
tag-6: MultiPremios is Citi's leading and most dynamic loyalty program, giving clients the ability to earn MultiPremios Miles for purchases at all commercial establishments. Miles can be applied toward gifts, travel and cash and can be redeemed through a variety of methods designed with clients' convenience in mind: directly at points of service for establishments affiliated with VisaNet; via telephone at Citiphone 1724; by transfer from a MultiPremios to LifeMiles account; or by crediting the award amount to the card balance just like cash.
tag-7: "Citi seeks to redefine the banking experience with innovative products, such as credit cards equipped with a chip for greater security and with easy, fast and secure access to digital banking via Citibank Online. We want our clients to have a unique experience when they use our products," said Bernardo Chacín, General Manager of Citi Guatemala.
tag-8: Card benefits include access to Citi Private Pass, the entertainment portal available to all Citi cardholders in the United States and now in Central America as well. The site provides access to U.S. reservations for countless concerts, plays, sports and family events, restaurants and more. Citi Private Pass purchases also earn double miles.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
